fields.name: Low Available Space On System Partition
fields.description: Add a fault when available space available on system partition is low
fields.code:
let limit=90 #% USED SPACE LIMIT
DEVICE=`mount |grep " on / "|awk '{print $1}'`
let used=`df -hl| grep $DEVICE| awk '{print $5}'|awk 'BEGIN {FS="%";} {print $1}'`
if [ $used -gt $limit ] ; then
  echo "The used space in / [$DEVICE] is $used%."
  echo "ACTION: You must delete files"
fi
